verses.verse: Behold my servant <S%H5650><s%>, whom I uphold <S%H8551><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; mine elect <S%H972><s%>, in whom my soul <S%H5315><s%> delighteth <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; I have put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> upon him: he shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> to the goyim <S%H1471><s%>.
He shall not cry <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, nor lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, nor cause his voice <S%H6963><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in the street <S%H2351><s%>.

A bruised <S%H7533><s%> <S%H8803><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> shall he not break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the smoking <S%H3544><s%> flax <S%H6594><s%> shall he not quench <S%H3518><s%> <S%H8762><s%>: he shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> unto truth <S%H571><s%>.

He shall not fail <S%H3543><s%> <S%H8799><s%> nor be discouraged <S%H7533><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, till he have set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>: and the isles <S%H339><s%> shall wait <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8762><s%> for his Torah <S%H8451><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, he that created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and stretched them out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; he that spread forth <S%H7554><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and that which cometh out <S%H6631><s%> of it; he that giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> breath <S%H5397><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%> upon it, and spirit <S%H7307><s%> to them that walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> therein:

I the YY <S%H3068><s%> have called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee in righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and will hold <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, and will keep <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee for a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, for a light <S%H216><s%> of the goyim <S%H1471><s%>;

To open <S%H6491><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%>, to bring out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the prisoners <S%H616><s%> from the prison <S%H4525><s%>, and them that sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> out of the prison <S%H3608><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.

I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>: that is my name <S%H8034><s%>: and my glory <S%H3519><s%> will I not give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to another <S%H312><s%>, neither my praise <S%H8416><s%> to graven images <S%H6456><s%>.

Behold, the former things <S%H7223><s%> are come to pass <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and new things <S%H2319><s%> do I declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8688><s%>: before they spring forth <S%H6779><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I tell <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8686><s%> you of them.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%>, and his praise <S%H8416><s%> from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, ye that go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and all that is therein <S%H4393><s%>; the isles <S%H339><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thereof.

Let the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their voice, the villages <S%H2691><s%> that Kedar <S%H6938><s%> doth inhabit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: let the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the rock <S%H5553><s%> sing <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, let them shout <S%H6681><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>.
Let them give <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his praise <S%H8416><s%> in the islands <S%H339><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as a mighty man <S%H1368><s%>, he shall stir up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8686><s%> jealousy <S%H7068><s%> like a man <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>: he shall cry <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, yea, roar <S%H6873><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; he shall prevail <S%H1396><s%> <S%H8691><s%> against his enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

I have long time <S%H5769><s%> holden my peace <S%H2814><s%> <S%H8689><s%>; I have been still <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and refrained <S%H662><s%> <S%H8691><s%> myself: now will I cry <S%H6463><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like a travailing woman <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; I will destroy <S%H5395><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and devour <S%H7602><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at once <S%H3162><s%>.

I will make waste <S%H2717><s%> <S%H8686><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%> and hills <S%H1389><s%>, and dry up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all their herbs <S%H6212><s%>; and I will make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> islands <S%H339><s%>, and I will dry up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the pools <S%H98><s%>.

And I will bring <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> by a way <S%H1870><s%> that they knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not; I will lead <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them in paths <S%H5410><s%> that they have not known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: I will make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> darkness <S%H4285><s%> light <S%H216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and crooked things <S%H4625><s%> straight <S%H4334><s%>. These things <S%H1697><s%> will I do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, and not forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them.

They shall be turned <S%H5472><s%> <S%H8738><s%> back <S%H268><s%>, they shall be greatly <S%H1322><s%> ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, that trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in graven images <S%H6459><s%>, that say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to the molten images <S%H4541><s%>, Ye are our 'elohim <S%H430><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, ye deaf <S%H2795><s%>; and look <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, ye blind <S%H5787><s%>, that ye may see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

Who is blind <S%H5787><s%>, but my servant <S%H5650><s%>? or deaf <S%H2795><s%>, as my messenger <S%H4397><s%> that I sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? who is blind <S%H5787><s%> as he that is perfect <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8794><s%>, and blind <S%H5787><s%> as the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> ?

Seeing <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> many things <S%H7227><s%>, but thou observest <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not; opening <S%H6491><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the ears <S%H241><s%>, but he heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> is well pleased <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for his righteousness <S%H6664><s%> ' sake; he will magnify <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the Torah <S%H8451><s%>, and make it honourable <S%H142><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

But this is a people <S%H5971><s%> robbed <S%H962><s%> <S%H8803><s%> and spoiled <S%H8154><s%> <S%H8803><s%>; they are all of them snared <S%H6351><s%> <S%H8687><s%> in holes <S%H2352><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H970><s%>, and they are hid <S%H2244><s%> <S%H8717><s%> in prison <S%H3608><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>: they are for a prey <S%H957><s%>, and none delivereth <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8688><s%>; for a spoil <S%H4933><s%>, and none saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, Restore <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%>.
Who among you will give ear <S%H238><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to this? who will hearken <S%H7181><s%> <S%H8686><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for the time to come <S%H268><s%> ?

Who gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> for a spoil <S%H4933><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H4882><s%>, and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to the robbers <S%H962><s%> <S%H8802><s%>? did not the YY <S%H3068><s%>, he against whom <S%H2098><s%> we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? for they would <S%H14><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>, neither were they `Ovedient <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto his Torah <S%H8451><s%>.

Therefore he hath poured <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon him the fury <S%H2534><s%> of his anger <S%H639><s%>, and the strength <S%H5807><s%> of battle <S%H4421><s%>: and it hath set him on fire <S%H3857><s%> <S%H8762><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, yet he knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not; and it burned <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, yet he laid <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it not to heart <S%H3820><s%>.
